text:
On both "main" publications the introduction pages show dead links i.e.
"Document Types" and "Features". Dead links are no good style and a known
useability issue.

IMO the link "Use Cases/Tests" is useless. The blog returns xhtml mixture on
"Use Cases Tests".

I think this needs some polishing ...soon.
creator: roku@apache.org

text: This should not prevent the release of 1.2
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
